definition: phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Gar county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Sgar rdzong
Tibetan government official/same as 噶布倫|噶布伦
Geju (Tibetan: transmit word of Buddha) sect of Tibetan Buddhist
Gar county in Ngari prefecture, Tibet, Tibetan: Sgar rdzong
Tanganyika on continent of West Africa, one component of Tanzania

sentences.english: Robin, Do not forget you have "break" in your car.
sentences.chinese: 刘浩然不要忘记你还有刹车的噶。

sentences.english: Karma today deserves a morning shift change the first night shift.
sentences.chinese: 今日糸早班转中班噶第一晚。

sentences.english: When a man sue for a lady's hand in marriage is prize their relationship.
sentences.chinese: 一个男人对女人最大噶尊重系向距求婚。

sentences.english: And then the Brake is still.
Have you thought about graduate school?
sentences.chinese: 你有无想过读研究生噶？

sentences.english: My childhood dream was to become a designer.
sentences.chinese: 做一名设计师成为左我细个噶一个梦想。

sentences.english: Pribaltiyskaya Square and the “Park Inn” hotel.
sentences.chinese: 巴利提斯噶广场和“公园客栈”小旅馆。

sentences.english: I am very interested in your love story before, you'd better tell me a complete story.
sentences.chinese: 我好有兴趣知你噶恋爱史，最好由头到尾同我讲一次。

sentences.english: This hot weather would die me?
Misplaced to the darshan of the devil.

definition: so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
the bleating of sheep/final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
